text: Heartbreaking. Absolutely heartbreaking. So much innocence was snatched away by pure evil. Please join me in praying for the students teachers staff & their families at this time. They're going to need strength & support in the days ahead.
Happy Armed Forces Day to those serving in the U.S. Military and their families! Thank you for your bravery sacrifice and service to this country! #ArmedForcesDay #FL02
ICYMI - My colleagues & I promptly sent a letter to Pres. Biden & the FDA Commissioner demanding information about how the FDA will mitigate the #formulashortage. Read the FULL letter here:  #FL02
